Articles.Description: The highly-anticipated Wicked (2024) movie musical starring Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande will hit theaters earlier than expected. Related: Filmmakers Call ‘The Little Mermaid’ Trailer The Oscars “Gross” and “Depressing” The popular Tony Award-winning music…
Articles.Content:
The highly-anticipated Wicked (2024) movie musical starring Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande will hit theaters earlier than expected.
